Text: RE Red Rock Receipts Cc Michelle Just a quick revision to Daves note below The end month for the original term should be October instead of September and the beginning month for the second term should be November instead of October If you have any questions please call me Dave is out today Thanks Barb Original Message From Smith David L Sent Tuesday November PM To Cc Cammarano Joseph A Smith David L Veety Barbra A Subject Red Rock Receipts Michelle Per our conversation PPL EnergyPlus requests that Transwestern assign mmbtu of primary receipts out of the West Texas Pool for the period beginning June through September During the four month period beginning October and ending February the primary receipts will be reduced to mmbtu Beginning March through June primary receipts will be increased to mmbtu For the four month period beginning October and ending February PPL requests an additional day to consider our supply options prior to electing a primary receipt for the mmbtu not assigned Best Regards David Smith

RE Red Rock Receipts Cc Michelle Just a quick revision to Daves note below The end month for the original term should be October instead of September and the beginning month for the second term should be November instead of October If you have any questions please call me Dave is out today Thanks Barb Original Message From Smith David L Sent Tuesday November PM To Cc Cammarano Joseph A Smith David L Veety Barbra A Subject Red Rock Receipts Michelle Per our conversation PPL EnergyPlus requests that Transwestern assign mmbtu of primary receipts out of the West Texas Pool for the period beginning June through September During the four month period beginning October and ending February the primary receipts will be reduced to mmbtu Beginning March through June primary receipts will be increased to mmbtu For the four month period beginning October and ending February PPL requests an additional day to consider our supply options prior to electing a primary receipt for the mmbtu not assigned Best Regards David Smith

RE gas to GriffithKim Ill be reviewing your offer with my boss early next week and will be in touch Have a good weekend Barb Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday March PM To Veety Barbra A Subject gas to Griffith Barb No problem for a July start date on the gas supply we discussed this morning The offer would remain the same whether June is included or not Also we would make a reasonable best efforts to take andor remarket your gas when the Griffith plant is down Of course if we couldnt do anything with it we would be held harmless Pricing would be based on a San Juan Gas Daily Index minus If we have to designate the plant as the primary delivery point on the capacity we wouldnt be able to flow the gas to the border on a firm basis We may only be able to sell it back in the basin Give me a call if you have any questions Thanks Kim Ward
